snippet: The abrupt change in the Nordic nations is one of the most striking consequences of the surge of asylum seekers in Europe this year.
abstract: Historically welcoming Nordic nations Sweden, Norway, Denmark and Finland abruptly revise asylum policies to counter ongoing influx of migrants into Europe; systemic limitations and populist political movements pressured leaders to change policies, disgruntling refugees and doing little to reduce flow of asylum seekers into region.
lead_paragraph: The abrupt change in the Nordic nations is one of the most striking consequences of the surge of asylum seekers in Europe this year.

headline.main: Nordic Countries, Overwhelmed by Migrants, Retreat From Generous Traditions
headline.print_headline: Nordic Countries Curtail Generosity to Migrants

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
